Interestingly, preferential expression of paralogs among ribosomal proteins have also been described in plants. In Arabidopsis thaliana, RPS5A is highly expressed in dividing cells, whereas RPS5B is expressed in cells undergoing differentiation
10 . Furthermore, the ribosomal protein RPL11B is highly expressed in all actively dividing cells, whereas the expression of its paralog, RPL11A, is tissue-specific
10 . Moreover, deletion of RPL23AA, but not of RPL23AB, impedes growth and leads to morphological abnormalities
49 .
